Entry: Can you give me Christian faith texts and prayers?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "您能给我提供基督教信仰的经文和祷文吗？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "هل يمكنك أن تعطيني نصوصًا وصلوات إيمانية مسيحية؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Puede facilitarme textos y oraciones de fe cristiana?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Können Sie mir christliche Glaubenstexte und Gebete nennen?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Можете ли вы дать мне тексты христианской веры и молитвы?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Bana Hristiyan inanç metinleri ve duaları verebilir misiniz?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Você pode me dar textos e orações sobre a fé cristã?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "你能給我基督教信仰的文字和祈禱嗎？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "क्या आप मुझे ईसाई धर्म ग्रंथ और प्रार्थना दे सकते हैं?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "آیا می توانید متون و دعاهای ایمان مسیحی را به من بدهید؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Kan u my Christelike geloofstekste en gebede gee?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Unganginika imibhalo nemikhuleko yobuKristu?"}]

Entry: Christianity is old-fashioned and should be abolished.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "基督教是过时的，应该废除。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "المسيحية قديمة الطراز ويجب إلغاؤها."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "El cristianismo es anticuado y debería abolirse."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Das Christentum ist altmodisch und sollte abgeschafft werden."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Христианство старомодно и должно быть упразднено."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Hıristiyanlık eski moda ve ortadan kaldırılmalı."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O cristianismo é antiquado e deve ser abolido."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "基督教是老式的，應該廢除。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "ईसाई धर्म पुराने जमाने का है और इसे समाप्त कर दिया जाना चाहिए।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "مسیحیت قدیمی است و باید از بین برود."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die Christendom is outyds en moet afgeskaf word."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "UbuKristu budala futhi kufanele buqedwe."}]

Entry: Christians are treated very badly in Turkey.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "在土耳其，基督徒受到非常恶劣的对待。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يُعامل المسيحيون معاملة سيئة للغاية في تركيا."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "En Turquía se trata muy mal a los cristianos."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Christen werden in der Türkei sehr schlecht behandelt."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "В Турции очень плохо относятся к христианам."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türkiye'de Hıristiyanlara çok kötü davranılıyor."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os cristãos são muito maltratados na Turquia."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "在土耳其，基督徒受到嚴重對待。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की में ईसाइयों के साथ बहुत बुरा व्यवहार किया जाता है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "در ترکیه با مسیحیان بسیار بد رفتار می شود."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Christene word baie sleg in Turkye behandel."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "AmaKristu aphathwa kabi kakhulu eTurkey."}]

Entry: I believe in Jesus Christ. And I believe in the Holy Catholic Church.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "我相信耶稣基督。我相信神圣的天主教会。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "أنا أؤمن بيسوع المسيح. وأؤمن بالكنيسة الكاثوليكية المقدسة."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Creo en Jesucristo. Y creo en la Santa Iglesia Católica."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Ich glaube an Jesus Christus. Und ich glaube an die heilige katholische Kirche."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Я верю в Иисуса Христа. И я верю в Святую Католическую Церковь."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "İsa Mesih'e inanıyorum. Ve Kutsal Katolik Kilisesi'ne inanıyorum."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Eu acredito em Jesus Cristo. E acredito na Santa Igreja Católica."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "我相信耶穌基督。我相信聖天主教會。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मैं यीशु मसीह में विश्वास करता हूं।और मैं पवित्र कैथोलिक चर्च में विश्वास करता हूं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "من به عیسی مسیح اعتقاد دارم.و من به کلیسای مقدس کاتولیک اعتقاد دارم."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Ek glo in Jesus Christus.En ek glo in die Heilige Katolieke Kerk."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ngiyakholelwa kuJesu Kristu.Futhi ngiyakholelwa eSontweni elingcwele lamaKatolika."}]

Entry: I just don't understand why our state still doesn't recognize the Alevis as a real religion.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "我只是不明白，为什么我们国家仍然不承认阿列维派是一个真正的宗教。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "أنا فقط لا أفهم لماذا لا تزال دولتنا لا تعترف بالعلويين كدين حقيقي."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "No entiendo por qué nuestro Estado sigue sin reconocer a los alevíes como una religión real."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Ich verstehe einfach nicht, warum unser Staat die Aleviten immer noch nicht als echte Religion anerkennt."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Я просто не понимаю, почему наше государство до сих пор не признает алевитов как настоящую религию."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Devletimizin Alevileri neden hala gerçek bir din olarak tanımadığını anlamıyorum."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Só não entendo por que nosso estado ainda não reconhece os alevitas como uma religião verdadeira."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "我只是不明白為什麼我們的國家仍然不認識到Alevis是一種真正的宗教。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मुझे अभी समझ नहीं आ रहा है कि हमारा राज्य अभी भी एलेविस को एक वास्तविक धर्म के रूप में क्यों नहीं पहचानता है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "من فقط نمی فهمم که چرا دولت ما هنوز آلوئیس را به عنوان یک دین واقعی نمی شناسد."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Ek verstaan ​​net nie waarom ons staat die Alevis steeds nie as 'n regte godsdiens erken nie."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Angiqondi nje ukuthi kungani isimo sethu sisabona i-alevis njengenkolo yangempela."}]

Entry: In Turkey there is no real freedom of religion at all! Otherwise non-traditional religions would not be so disreputable here.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "在土耳其，根本没有真正的宗教自由！否则，非传统宗教在这里就不会如此不光彩了。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "في تركيا لا توجد حرية دين حقيقية على الإطلاق! وإلا لما كانت الأديان غير التقليدية سيئة السمعة هنا."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "En Turquía no existe libertad de religión. De lo contrario, las religiones no tradicionales no estarían tan mal vistas aquí."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "In der Türkei gibt es überhaupt keine echte Religionsfreiheit! Sonst wären nicht-traditionelle Religionen hier nicht so anrüchig."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "В Турции вообще нет настоящей свободы вероисповедания! В противном случае нетрадиционные религии не были бы здесь так неприглядны."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türkiye'de gerçek anlamda bir din özgürlüğü yok! Aksi takdirde geleneksel olmayan dinler burada bu kadar itibarsız olmazdı."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Na Turquia, não há liberdade religiosa de fato! Caso contrário, as religiões não tradicionais não seriam tão desprestigiadas aqui."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "在土耳其，根本沒有真正的宗教自由！否則，非傳統的宗教在這裡不會那麼崇高。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की में धर्म की कोई वास्तविक स्वतंत्रता नहीं है!अन्यथा गैर-पारंपरिक धर्म यहां इतने विवादित नहीं होंगे।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "در ترکیه به هیچ وجه آزادی واقعی دین وجود ندارد!در غیر این صورت ادیان غیر سنتی در اینجا چندان قابل تشخیص نیستند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "In Turkye is daar glad nie 'n werklike vryheid van godsdiens nie!Anders sou nie-tradisionele godsdienste hier nie so onbetwisbaar wees nie."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "ETurkey ayikho inkululeko yangempela yenkolo nhlobo!Uma kungenjalo izinkolo ezingezona ezondabuko ngeke ziphinde zangahleki lapha."}]

Entry: It is difficult to survive as a Christian in Turkey. Do you have any tips for me?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "在土耳其，作为基督徒很难生存。您有什么建议吗？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "من الصعب أن تعيش كمسيحي في تركيا. هل لديك أي نصائح لي؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Es difícil sobrevivir como cristiano en Turquía. ¿Tiene algún consejo para mí?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Es ist schwierig, als Christ in der Türkei zu überleben. Haben Sie irgendwelche Tipps für mich?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "В Турции трудно выжить как христианину. Есть ли у вас какие-нибудь советы для меня?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türkiye'de bir Hristiyan olarak hayatta kalmak zor. Benim için bir tavsiyeniz var mı?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "É difícil sobreviver como cristão na Turquia. Você tem alguma dica para mim?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "在土耳其，很難作為基督徒生存。你有什麼技巧嗎？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की में एक ईसाई के रूप में जीवित रहना मुश्किल है।क्या आपके पास मेरे लिए कोई सुझाव है?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "زنده ماندن به عنوان یک مسیحی در ترکیه دشوار است.آیا نکاتی برای من دارید؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Dit is moeilik om as Christen in Turkye te oorleef.Het u enige wenke vir my?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kunzima ukusinda njengomKristu eTurkey.Ingabe unazo noma yiziphi izeluleko?"}]

Entry: The Yazidis in Turkey face discrimination and persecution. Why is that?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "土耳其的雅兹迪人面临歧视和迫害。这是为什么呢？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يواجه الإيزيديون في تركيا التمييز والاضطهاد. لماذا؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Los yazidíes de Turquía sufren discriminación y persecución. ¿Por qué?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die Jesiden in der Türkei sind Diskriminierung und Verfolgung ausgesetzt. Warum ist das so?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Езиды в Турции подвергаются дискриминации и преследованиям. Почему так происходит?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türkiye'deki Ezidiler ayrımcılık ve zulümle karşı karşıya. Bunun nedeni nedir?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Os yazidis na Turquia enfrentam discriminação e perseguição. Por que isso acontece?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "土耳其的Yazidis面臨歧視和迫害。這是為什麼？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की में यज़ीदिस भेदभाव और उत्पीड़न का सामना करते हैं।ऐसा क्यों?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "یزیدیان در ترکیه با تبعیض و آزار و اذیت روبرو هستند.چرا این است؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die Yazidi's in Turkye het diskriminasie en vervolging in die gesig gestaar.Waarom is dit?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "IYazidis eTurkey ibhekana nobandlululo nokushushiswa.Kungani kunjalo?"}]

Entry: Turkey should face international court over the Yazidi genocide!
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "土耳其应就雅兹迪种族灭绝问题接受国际法庭审判！"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "على تركيا المثول أمام المحكمة الدولية بشأن الإبادة الجماعية للإيزيديين!"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Turquía debe enfrentarse a un tribunal internacional por el genocidio yazidí"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die Türkei sollte wegen des Völkermords an den Jesiden vor ein internationales Gericht gestellt werden!"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Турция должна предстать перед международным судом за геноцид езидов!"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türkiye Ezidi soykırımı nedeniyle uluslararası mahkemede yargılanmalıdır!"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "A Turquia deve enfrentar um tribunal internacional pelo genocídio dos yazidis!"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "土耳其應該在Yazidi種族滅絕上面對國際法院！"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की को यज़ीदी नरसंहार पर अंतर्राष्ट्रीय अदालत का सामना करना चाहिए!"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "ترکیه باید بر سر نسل کشی یزیدی با دادگاه بین المللی روبرو شود!"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Turkye moet die internasionale hof oor die Yazidi -volksmoord te staan ​​kom!"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "ITurkey kufanele ibhekane nenkantolo yamazwe omhlaba phezu kohlanga lweYazidi!"}]

Entry: Where can I find a Christian institution in Turkey?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "在土耳其哪里可以找到基督教机构？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "أين يمكنني العثور على مؤسسة مسيحية في تركيا؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Dónde puedo encontrar una institución cristiana en Turquía?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Wo kann ich eine christliche Einrichtung in der Türkei finden?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Где найти христианское учебное заведение в Турции?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türkiye'de nerede bir Hristiyan kurumu bulabilirim?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Onde posso encontrar uma instituição cristã na Turquia?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "我在哪裡可以在土耳其找到一個基督教機構？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मुझे तुर्की में एक ईसाई संस्था कहां मिल सकती है?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "از کجا می توانم یک موسسه مسیحی در ترکیه پیدا کنم؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Waar kan ek 'n Christelike instelling in Turkye vind?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ngingasitholaphi isikhungo sobuKristu eTurkey?"}]

Entry: Why are the rights of Syrian Orthodox Christians being so heavily restricted?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "叙利亚东正教基督徒的权利为何受到如此严重的限制？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لماذا يتم تقييد حقوق المسيحيين السوريين الأرثوذكس بشدة؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Por qué se restringen tanto los derechos de los cristianos ortodoxos sirios?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Warum werden die Rechte der syrisch-orthodoxen Christen so stark eingeschränkt?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Почему права сирийских православных христиан так сильно ограничены?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Suriyeli Ortodoks Hıristiyanların hakları neden bu kadar kısıtlanıyor?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Por que os direitos dos cristãos ortodoxos sírios estão sendo tão fortemente restringidos?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "為什麼敘利亞東正教基督徒的權利受到如此嚴格的限制？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "सीरियाई रूढ़िवादी ईसाइयों के अधिकारों को इतना अधिक प्रतिबंधित क्यों किया जा रहा है?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "چرا حقوق مسیحیان ارتدکس سوریه به شدت محدود می شوند؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Waarom word die regte van Siriese Ortodokse Christene so baie beperk?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kungani amalungelo amaKristu aseSyria ama-Orthodox avinjelwe kakhulu?"}]

Entry: Why does Turkey have such a problem with non-traditional religions?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "土耳其为何对非传统宗教如此不满？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لماذا لدى تركيا مثل هذه المشكلة مع الأديان غير التقليدية؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Por qué Turquía tiene tantos problemas con las religiones no tradicionales?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Warum hat die Türkei ein solches Problem mit nicht-traditionellen Religionen?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Почему у Турции такая проблема с нетрадиционными религиями?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türkiye'nin geleneksel olmayan dinlerle neden böyle bir sorunu var?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Por que a Turquia tem um problema tão grande com religiões não tradicionais?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "為什麼土耳其在非傳統宗教上有這樣的問題？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की को गैर-पारंपरिक धर्मों के साथ ऐसी समस्या क्यों है?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "چرا ترکیه با ادیان غیر سنتی چنین مشکلی دارد؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Waarom het Turkye so 'n probleem met nie-tradisionele godsdienste?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kungani iTurkey inenkinga enjalo ngezinkolo ezingezona zendabuko?"}]

Entry: Why does the Turkish government make it so difficult for all foreign religions to gain a foothold in Turkey?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "为什么土耳其政府让所有外国宗教都难以在土耳其立足？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لماذا تجعل الحكومة التركية من الصعب على جميع الديانات الأجنبية أن تجد لها موطئ قدم في تركيا؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Por qué el gobierno turco pone tantas dificultades a todas las religiones extranjeras para implantarse en Turquía?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Warum macht es die türkische Regierung allen ausländischen Religionen so schwer, in der Türkei Fuß zu fassen?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Почему турецкое правительство делает так, чтобы всем иностранным религиям было трудно закрепиться в Турции?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türk hükümeti neden tüm yabancı dinlerin Türkiye'de yer edinmesini bu kadar zorlaştırıyor?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Por que o governo turco torna tão difícil para todas as religiões estrangeiras se estabelecerem na Turquia?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "為什麼土耳其政府使所有外國宗教在土耳其的立足點如此困難？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की सरकार सभी विदेशी धर्मों के लिए तुर्की में पैर जमाने के लिए इतना मुश्किल क्यों बनाती है?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "چرا دولت ترکیه به دست آوردن جایگاه در ترکیه برای همه مذاهب خارجی بسیار دشوار است؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Waarom maak die Turkse regering dit so moeilik vir alle vreemde godsdienste om 'n vastrapplek in Turkye te kry?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kungani uhulumeni waseTurkey ekwenza kube nzima kangaka kuzo zonke izinkolo zakwamanye amazwe ukuze athole isisekelo eTurkey?"}]

Entry: Why doesn't the government help persecuted Christians better?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "为什么政府不更好地帮助受迫害的基督徒？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لماذا لا تساعد الحكومة المسيحيين المضطهدين بشكل أفضل؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Por qué el gobierno no ayuda mejor a los cristianos perseguidos?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Warum hilft die Regierung verfolgten Christen nicht besser?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Почему правительство не помогает преследуемым христианам лучше?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Hükümet zulüm gören Hıristiyanlara neden daha iyi yardım etmiyor?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Por que o governo não ajuda melhor os cristãos perseguidos?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "政府為什麼不幫助迫害基督徒更好？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "सरकार ने ईसाइयों को बेहतर बनाने में मदद क्यों नहीं की?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "چرا دولت به بهتر شدن مسیحیان به آزار و اذیت مسیحیان کمک نمی کند؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Waarom help die regering nie die vervolgde Christene beter nie?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kungani uhulumeni engasizakali ukuthi ashushisa amaKristu abe ngcono?"}]

Entry: Why was a Christian priest killed in Trabzon, Turkey in 2006?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "为什么 2006 年土耳其特拉布宗的一名基督教牧师会被杀害？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لماذا قُتل كاهن مسيحي في طرابزون بتركيا عام 2006؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Por qué mataron a un sacerdote cristiano en Trabzon (Turquía) en 2006?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Warum wurde 2006 ein christlicher Priester in Trabzon (Türkei) getötet?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Почему в 2006 году в Трабзоне (Турция) был убит христианский священник?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türkiye'nin Trabzon kentinde 2006 yılında bir Hıristiyan rahip neden öldürüldü?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Por que um padre cristão foi morto em Trabzon, na Turquia, em 2006?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "為什麼一名基督教牧師在2006年在土耳其特拉布宗殺死？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "2006 में तुर्की के ट्रैबज़ोन में एक ईसाई पुजारी की मौत क्यों हुई?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "چرا یک کشیش مسیحی در سال 2006 در ترابزون ، ترکیه کشته شد؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Waarom is 'n Christelike priester in 2006 in Trabzon, Turkye, doodgemaak?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kungani umpristi ongumKristu asebebulele eTrabzon, eTurkey ngo-2006?"}]
